title: I’ve Changed My Job From [Sage] to [Thief] - Novel Updates
tags: Adventurers   Calm Protagonist   Former Hero   Guilds   Heroes   Magic   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Multiple Transported Individuals   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R-15   Summoned Hero   Sword And Magic   Thieves   Wizards
author: Leonar D   レオナールD
description:
After being summoned to another world, [Sage] Kagehiko Kurono succeeded in defeating the Demon King together with the hero party.

He was promised that he would be returned to Japan after defeating the Demon King, but what the hero party was given upon their return was an unreasonable demand from the king.

“I don't have to work for this country anymore. I will do as I please.”

When the king tried to break his promise, Kagehiko told him straight out.

“I'm quitting my job as a [Sage] and becoming a [Thief]!”

A man who has mastered magic as a [Sage] is reborn as a fearless and unpredictable [Thief]!

In a world of swords and magic, the greatest thief of all time flies through the night sky in search of treasures!>
